titles.title: A resolution designating March 22, 2017, as "National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day".
A resolution designating March 22, 2017, as "National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates March 22, 2017, as National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day.
Commends rehabilitation counselors and professional organizations assisting individuals who require rehabilitation.
